title: Admin Help Guide
description: Because even those that make this bot forget how it works

fields.title: ->sudo add role [user] [role]
fields.description: Add role to user

fields.title: ->sudo inrole [roles]
fields.description: Lists users in the provided roles

fields.title: ->sudo rm role [user] [role]
fields.description: Remove role from user

fields.title: ->sudo award [user] [amount]
fields.description: Add tomatoes to a user

fields.title: ->sudo add vials [user] [amount]
fields.description: Add vials to a user

fields.title: ->sudo add lemons [user] [amount]
fields.description: Add lemons to a user

fields.title: ->sudo add card [user] [card]
fields.description: Add a card to a user

fields.title: ->sudo remove card [user] [card]
fields.description: Remove a card from a user

fields.title: ->sudo stress [amount]
fields.description: Spams test messages according to amount

fields.title: ->sudo guild lock [collection]
fields.description: Add a cost-free lock to a guild

fields.title: ->sudo guild unlock [collection]
fields.description: Remove a cost-free lock from a guild

fields.title: ->sudo daily reset [user]
fields.description: Resets a user's daily allowing them to run daily again

fields.title: ->sudo guild herocheck
fields.description: Forces a herocheck in current guild

fields.title: ->sudo sum [card]
fields.description: Summons a card even if you don't own it

fields.title: ->sudo reset eval [card ID]
fields.description: Forcefully empties eval data for auction eval on a specific card ID

fields.title: ->sudo eval info [card name]
fields.description: Displays current eval information for specified card

fields.title: ->sudo eval force [card name]
fields.description: Forces all currently waiting auction evals into the actual card eval, bypassing normal limit filters

fields.title: ->sudo crash
fields.description: Sends a test error for ayano

fields.title: ->sudo embargo [user] [optional `lift`]
fields.description: Embargoes a user from some bot features, if lift is anywhere in command, removes embargo instead

fields.title: ->sudo wip [optional message]
fields.description: Sets bot to WIP mode, disallowing anyone besides admins/mods from running commands. Optional message will be displayed instead of default if given.

fields.title: ->sudo lock auc
fields.description: Toggles the lock on auction selling, when enabled all `->auc sell` commands are rejected

fields.title: ->sudo announce [Title], [Body]
fields.description: Set a new announcement message for DMing people with notify pref on, and for display in ->daily on a user's next daily. Title CANNOT have a comma, as title and body are split by comma

fields.title: ->sudo top tomatoes
fields.description: Leaderboard for every user based on amount of tomatoes

fields.title: ->sudo top vials
fields.description: Leaderboard for every user based on amount of vials

fields.title: ->sudo top lemons
fields.description: Leaderboard for every user based on amount of lemons

fields.title: ->sudo top clout
fields.description: Leaderboard for every user based on amount of clout

fields.title: ->fraud report 1
fields.description: Displays a list of users with a high auction sell percentage

fields.title: ->fraud report 2
fields.description: Displays a list of auctions selling for a certain amount over eval

fields.title: ->fraud report 3
fields.description: Displays where a user sells a card on auction, and re-purchases that same card

fields.title: ->fraud report 4
fields.description: Same as report 3, but the person has to be the same person the auction went to

fields.title: ->fraud report 5
fields.description: Displays when a user purchases a card via direct sale or auction and sells the card to bot

fields.title: ->audit user [user_id]
fields.description: Lists all transactions done by the user

fields.title: ->audit list [user_id]
fields.description: Acts as if you are the user running list/cards. Accepts queries as well

fields.title: ->audit guild [guild_id]
fields.description: Lists all transactions done in a specific guild

fields.title: ->audit auc [auc_id]
fields.description: Shows detailed information on the auction, including bids, time of bids, id's of bidders etc.

fields.title: ->audit trans [trans_id]
fields.description: Lists more detailed information about a transaction

fields.title: ->audit find user [user_id]
fields.description: Brings up a quick overview page of a user to show base profile info

fields.title: ->audit find obj
fields.description: Used if you have the Mongo object ID but not the user ID (added purely to find users caught with errors)

fields.title: ->audit find trans [user_id] [query]
fields.description: Search a user's transactions for a specific card/collection/etc

fields.title: ->audit confirm [audit_id]
fields.description: Marks a fraud report item as audited

fields.title: ->audit closed
fields.description: Lists all recent fraud report items that were marked as confirmed

fields.title: ->tag mod info #tag [card]
fields.description: Displays info about a tag as well as the user ID of the person who created it

fields.title: ->tag list [starts_with]
fields.description: Displays a list of unique tag names that are visible on cards. Starts_with will filter to only those that start with your query

fields.title: ->tag remove #tag [card]
fields.description: Removes a tag from a card

fields.title: ->tag ban #tag [card]
fields.description: Removes a tag from a card, and gives the user a strike on their account, as well as a PM. 3 strikes and they are out

fields.title: ->tag restore #tag [card]
fields.description: Restores a tag, if the tag was banned. Removes a strike and DM's the user to let them know

fields.title: ->audit user tags [user_id]
fields.description: Acts like `->tags created` but as the queried user. Lists in order of date created

fields.title: Now-written edge cases
fields.description:
**Collection name** can bypass the need for underscores if it is as displayed in col info.
**#incest may be valid**, delete it anyway
**#meme is nox allowed**, for cards that are funny/art that is funny
**English only**, unless a borrowed word used commonly in english
**Card name tags**, Remove, especially if broken into multiple pieces(e.g. Gift of Senko = #gift #of #senko, gift and senko would be valid because of the art, of would not)
